summary.span: 表示方法或构造函数内的局部变量。

span.span: Represents a local variable within a method or constructor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `LocalBuilder`可以使用方法来定义对象 。A `LocalBuilder` object can be defined using the method. ## Examples 下面的示例 `static` `Shared` 在名为的 Visual Basic) 中创建一个 (方法 `Function1` ，该方法返回一个字符串，并且具有类型为的参数 。The following example creates a `static` method (`Shared` in Visual Basic) named `Function1` that returns a string and has a parameter of type . 在方法的主体中，代码示例创建 表示两个局部变量的对象，并为局部变量设置符号信息。In the body of the method, the code example creates objects representing two local variables, and sets symbol information for the local variables. 方法不会执行任何操作，但方法体演示如何将参数存储到本地变量、将文本字符串存储到局部变量以及加载局部变量。The method does not do anything significant, but the method body demonstrates storing a parameter to a local variable, storing a literal string to a local variable, and loading a local variable. [!code-cpp[LocalBuilder_Sample_SetLocalSymInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/LocalBuilder_Sample_SetLocalSymInfo/CPP/localbuilder_sample_4.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[LocalBuilder_Sample_SetLocalSymInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/LocalBuilder_Sample_SetLocalSymInfo/CS/localbuilder_sample_4.cs#1)] [!code-vb[LocalBuilder_Sample_SetLocalSymInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/LocalBuilder_Sample_SetLocalSymInfo/VB/localbuilder_sample_4.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示局部变量引用的对象是否固定于内存中。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the object referred to by the local variable is pinned in memory.

value.span: 如果局部变量引用的对象固定于内存中，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the object referred to by the local variable is pinned in memory; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在不安全代码中，必须先固定对象，然后才能通过非托管指针引用该对象。In unsafe code, an object must be pinned before it can be referred to by an unmanaged pointer. 当被引用的对象固定时，它无法通过垃圾回收进行移动。While the referenced object is pinned, it cannot be moved by garbage collection.

.property instance int32 LocalIndex
Public Overrides ReadOnly Property LocalIndex As Integer
public: virtual property int LocalIndex { int get(); };
member this.LocalIndex : int

summary.span: 在方法体中获取局部变量的从零开始的索引。

span.span: Gets the zero-based index of the local variable within the method body.

value.span: 一个整数值，表示方法体内局部变量的声明顺序。

span.span: An integer value that represents the order of declaration of the local variable within the method body.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 索引号按其声明或发出的顺序（从零开始）分配给本地变量。Index numbers are assigned to local variables in the order in which they are declared or emitted, beginning with zero.
